headline: The London Company Mid Cap Portfolio Sold Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) in Q2. Here’s Why
summary: The London Company, an investment management company, released “The London Company Mid Cap Strategy” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. US equities saw a double-digit surge in the second quarter following a sharp decline in the first quarter. The mid-cap composite rose 5.7% (5.5% net) in the second […]

headline: Skyworks Solutions: Undervalued, Undiversified, And Under Pressure (Rating Downgrade)
summary: I am downgrading Skyworks Solutions from 'Buy' to 'Hold' due to worsening fundamentals and heightened risks.
